Ricky Gervais has defended the jokes he made about Hollywood stars at Sunday's Golden Globes. Speaking on Piers Morgan 's new US chat show, the comedian said: If they didn't want me, they shouldn't have hired me.... I don't think I did anything wrong. The British comedian received mixed reviews after openly mocking Hollywood A-listers including Angelina Jolie and Johnny Depp . While defending his comments Ricky Gervais added:`` I'm not going to apologise for being true to myself.

Jan. 23( Bloomberg)-- West African leaders asked Alassane Ouattara , the internationally recognized President of Ivory Coast, to nominate a new head for the West African Central Bank after Governor Philippe-Henri Dacoury-Tabley resigned yesterday. The conference has taken note of the resignation, according to a statement published on the website of the West African Economic and Monetary Union( WAEMU) dated Jan. 22. The declaration was signed by Malian President Amani Toumani Toure, chair of the meeting.
